case.title: Handsome guy in NW London here - fancy meeting tonight? - 30 (NW - Camden/Hampstead)
case.text:
Had a bit of a busy week and didn't get around to planning anything fun for tonight, so now I'm free on a Friday - not used to this! So thought I'd see if anyone else is in a similar position...
Looking for a woman who's laid back and normal like me, for a bit of fun tonight - I'm in NW London.
I'm tall and good looking, dark hair, in good shape. Happy to send some pics so you can decide for yourself!
If you fancy it let's arrange something now!
